project.name: C-C401A-GREP-01-ST02-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C401A-GREP-01-ST02-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Long input will cause a lot of memory to be allocated and if it is an odd length, the program won't properly free the allocatedmemory causing a memory leak.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
